name: Ceres: Space game Survival war
description:
We’ll give you a chance to survive miles away from Earth! Can you survive miles away from Earth?
Ceres - is an amazing survival RPG game.
Create your own extraordinary character and hand go to conquer the galaxy in a myriad of incredible space adventures!
Feel the stunning outer space atmosphere yourself.

Show yourself in dynamic and exciting battles, take part in catchy missions and find your place in this world.
Choose your class, customize your character to your own taste and explore the endless systems and galaxies, to have a full, space surviving experience.
Prepare yourself and fight for survival!
You find yourself in an asteroid belt, not far away from Mars. For now it's almost an abandoned place , but back in the days it was a prosperous zone, full of useful resources.
After the asteroids were exhausted, they were disposed of as waste material. And the same happened to you.
That's right, you are - engineers and researchers, left by the Corporation for the will of fate.
And now your task is not just to survive in the belt of asteroids, but also investigate the Corporate secrets, on which the life of you and your crew depends.

Are you ready for a journey through thousands of light years?

Protect your ship, your crew, and the whole universe!
The world will never be the same, but for now, your ship is your world!
And you are in charge! Which way would you take? It's all up to you.
Upgrade & Customize your character and your ship, create your own unique style.
Stand up and fight your enemies away, because the fate of the galaxy is in your hands.

We tried to make the game interesting and satisfying, with all respect and passion to this genre, so it's not just "another survival game in space". It's not just a game with cool graphics, but also a full story with decisions and consequences.

Tired of thousands of pointless quests? Then “Ceres” is the best choice for you and your friends!
